channel.title: CreativeScape Cache
channel.description: Ok, so I run client and it says error and I added a new folder in C:/Windows called Espkc_32 and the serv and client works perfect! But if I get players to join they have to do the same thing EVERY player. So how do I fix so it auto add a folder called Espkc_32 in Windows folder?

item.title: CreativeScape Cache
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:

Ok, so I run client and it says error and I added a new folder in C:/Windows called Espkc_32 and the serv and client works perfect! But if I get players to join they have to do the same thing EVERY player. So how do I fix so it auto add a folder called Espkc_32 in Windows folder?
